page.title: 05HEALTH IN CRUDEN BAY.
page.content: The area is served by two doctors, Dr James Sandeman, and Dr. Graham Ferguson. There are two surgeries, one in Cruden Bay, and the other in the neighbouring village of Hatton. There are about 3200 patients in the two villages and the surrounding countryside. The doctors take it in turn to be on call day and night. the most common illnesses are ear infection, throat infection, and stomach ache. Surgery hours in Cruden Bay. Monday:- 11.30 - 13.00 Tuesday:-11.30 - 13.00 Wednesday:- 11.30 - 13.00 Thursday:- 14.00 - 16.30 (ante-natal) Friday:- 11.30 - 13.00. The surgery is situated next to a chemist's shop where patients can get their prescribed medicines.
